TopicTitle: Parody of the song "Home" by Phillip Phillips *Requesting stock aircrafts/rockets*

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I am making a parody of Phillip Phillips "Home" song in which I am currently compiling the lyrics for and quite possibly singing myself. I want it to not only have my crafts but YOURS to be in the video. So send me a link to your craft and I will mention the name and owner in the video itself.

*ONLY ACCEPTING 15 CRAFTS!!*
